attributes.action: UK Armed Forces for UK defence!
attributes.additional_details: Sign this petition if you want to see the UK armed forces utilised in the defence of the UK and in humanitarian emergencies only. Stop the use of our forces around the globe, fighting battles and wars with no benefit to the Uk. Protect our forces and minimise the tragic loss of life and waste of tax payers money by using them only to defend British territories. OUR forces for OUR Country!
